resources.string: We would like to thank you for downloading the Hymn App and using it, for it gives us encouragement and makes it possible for this app to be available for free.

The hymn app is not a business, we have never had plans to monetize our app nor to sell data or ads. We make the content available for free because we believe in the mission to help people draw closer to God. Help us get this app with friends and family. You can donate using the following
This app was designed and developed by Tech and Graphics in close collaboration with Zonse Media.

National Bank of Malawi
Account Name : Comfort Mwalija
